message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. If you buy it, you'll be getting a great deal, and I'm willing to give you a 10% discount if you agree to buy this product now. If you don't buy it now, the price will not change, but I'll have to consider selling it to someone else, and you might miss out on this opportunity.
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, and I'm not willing to pay full price without knowing its quality. I'd like to wait and see the outcome of the next product.

If you buy the next product and it's also high-quality, you'll be getting a great deal, as the price will be the same as the one I offered for this product.
